name: Color Match (AcheGames)
description:
Player has 3 lives. You will lose 1 life each time the ball color does not match or if the ball touches the spikes at the bottom. In random time, the game will spawn a  "Power Ball"  item, make your ball go through that item and reach  to the bottom to get extra points.  Higher the score, the ball drop time will be reduced.

KEY    A   moves the ball holder to the left

KEY    D  moves the ball holder to the right

mouse left click on between diagonal dots will create a temporary walls . player can place up to 5 temporary walls.
